message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's important to reach an agreement early before inflation eats our money!
Your offer was a bit too low for me, Alice. How about we try a more even split this time?
Bob, let's be realistic.  We're losing money with every round. I'll meet you halfway - $55 for me, $45 for you.  Take it before it shrinks further!
